list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: quick to detect or respond to slight changes, signals, or influences.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the new method of protein detection was more sensitive than earlier ones
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Phương pháp phát hiện protein mới nhạy cảm hơn so với các phương tiện trước đó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person or a person's behavior) having or displaying a quick and delicate appreciation of others' feelings.
kept secret or with restrictions on disclosure to avoid endangering security.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was suspected of passing sensitive information to other countries
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông bị nghi ngờ truyền thông tin nhạy cảm với các nước khác

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who is believed to respond to occult influences.
